id: This Epionce 3-Step Skin Barrier Repair Kit Is on Sale for $24
paragraph: Dr. Carl Thornfeldt’s skin-care line Epionce has a reputation among beauty obsessives as a no-nonsense, highly effective line from a practicing doctor (it’s what dermatologists use). One of Epionce’s big goals is repairing the skin barrier, which not only creates healthy skin but also helps with conditions like eczema and psoriasis. Right now, the brand’s three-step skin barrier repair kit, which includes one-ounce versions of a milky cleanser, a medical barrier cream with hyaluronic acid and ceramides, and an SPF 30 lotion, is 20 percent off.
